fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An editing error led our obituary of Sir Michael Howard to say that he attended Wellington school in Somerset. In fact the military historian attended Wellington college in Berkshire (2 December, page 8, Journal). • Other recently corrected articles include: London police defend decision to drop Jeffrey Epstein investigation Like those of greats before him, David Warner’s triple century was a giant feat in a dull game Danish bacon: what happens when you push pigs to the limit?
